name: BIG STREET
description:
Trade actions step by step to get over millions in a truly realistic environment.

A game with easy to visualize data, The actions of the company is display in a real-time stat windows.

A safe environment with none of the actual trading risk of losing real money.

This Game/Software is a trading simulator that produce KODDEXE.

KODDEXE is a local "Blue Rabbit" specific currency that allows user to buy game key-code and trade multiple value.
